/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/usr/bin/c++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX14.4.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/YourGameProject.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/YourGameProject.dir/src/Game.cpp.o -o YourGameProject -F/Library/Frameworks   -L/opt/homebrew/Cellar/sdl2_image/2.8.2_1/lib  -L/opt/homebrew/lib  -L/opt/homebrew/Cellar/sdl2_mixer/2.8.0/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/Cellar/sdl2_image/2.8.2_1/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/Cellar/sdl2_mixer/2.8.0/lib -Wl,-rpath,/Library/Frameworks /Library/Frameworks/SDL2.framework/Versions/A/SDL2 -lSDL2_image -lSDL2 -lSDL2_mixer -lSDL2 -lSDL2_mixer
